duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport goods by operating a tractor-trailer and ensuring safe and timely delivery.
Maintain an accurate logbook, communicate with dispatch, and comply with safety regulations.
Load and unload equipment onto and off of trailers, with a focus on flatbed loading and securing.
Read and interpret shipping documents to ensure accurate delivery and receipt of goods.
Engage in manual loading and unloading of goods as required, demonstrating physical strength and endurance.
Exhibit excellent communication skills and a positive attitude while working independently to meet delivery deadlines.
High school diploma or equivalent required, with bilingual proficiency in Spanish and English considered a plus.
